reviews.text: 33cl can from Lidl in Oulu, Finland. Pours with quite thick white head with clear golden liquid. Texture is quite thin, but nice lively carbonation helps it .Mild bready aroma. Watery. Basic pilsener, good beer for its price, quenches thirst in hot summer days but does not offer much taste.
Bottle. Amber color with off-white head. Aroma has caramel, grass and malt. Taste is malty with quite bitter and dry aftertaste. Flavors of caramel, malt, fruits.

Bottled. Black beer, thin mocha head. Heavy syrupy maltiness, molasses, salty licorice, a hint of tar. Hints of dark chocolate and tar, some apricot jam. Malta, smoke flavor without being too sweet, some sour fruits. Bitter finish. Medium to full body, soft texture with sticky yeastiness.
